name: Cafe Panic: Cooking Restaurant
description:
Manage your own Coffee Shop and join in the cooking game fever. Create a new recipes, travel through different countries and become a world-famous chef.


MANY LEVELS AND HOURS OF FUN
More than 400 levels, 120 recipes and 50 customers to complete and new seasons every month!.

IMPROVE YOUR MENTAL SPEED
Each level is a challenge for your mind, the number of customers and orders will grow and you will have to attend as quickly as possible.

OPEN COFFEE SHOPS THROUGHOUT THE WORLD
What are you waiting for to invest your money and open another Cafe in Japan, France, Brazil, Russia or England. New recipes and decorations await for you in each country.

IMPROVE YOUR MACHINES
Acquire new machines for your Coffee Shop, upgrade them and give them maintenance. Ovens, Blenders, Grills and Woks!

NEW RECIPES AND DISHES
Learn new recipes and complex combinations. Your customers will pay more for an Unicorn Frappé, Kebabs or Frozen Green Tea!

CUTE DECORATIONS
Add decorations and turn your cafe into a luxurious meeting point to eat a delicious cookies or waffles!

IMPROVE YOUR ADMINISTRATOR'S SKILLS
Choose between a girl or a boy to train an expert and prepare the richest coffees, Chocolate, Donuts, Lattes, Cupcakes, Pizzas and Tacos.

MINIGAMES
Take advantage of the bonus time by dropping coffee drops and collecting tons of prizes!

MONITOR THE WI-FI AREA
Fix the Wi-Fi zone when it fails and prevent people from going mad without paying!
